ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Confirmed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Reunion")), OR(ISBLANK(Practitioner_Licence__c), ISBLANK(Practitioner__c ), AND(ISBLANK(Venue__c), ISBLANK(Parent_Host__c), ISPICKVAL(Delivery_Type__c, "Physical")) ), NOT($Permission.Override_Session_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ensure that the Practitioner, Licence and either Venue or Parent Host have been populated before marking the session as confirmed
